innerDustLimit - The inner dust limit of the band

e - The orbital eccentricity of the mass

                               double outsideRange)
Indicates whether there is any dust available for accretion in the specified range.

Parameters:
insideRange - The inner radius to be tested
outsideRange - The outer radius to be tested
Returns:
true
if there is dust available in the specified range otherwise 
false

updateDustLanes

protected void updateDustLanes(double min,
                               double max,
                               double mass,
                               double critMass,
                               double bodyInnerBound,
                               double bodyOuterBound)
Processes the current dust lanes, splitting and merging them as necessary.

Parameters:
min - The minimum range from the star to update dust lanes for
max - The maximum range from the star to update dust lanes for
mass - The current planetary mass
critMass - The critical mass value
bodyInnerBound - The inner radius of the effect of the body
bodyOuterBound - The outer radius of the effect of the body

collectDust

protected double collectDust(double lastMass,
                             com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.Accrete.NewRecord newstuff,
                             double a,
                             double e,
                             double critMass,
                             DustRecord dustBand)
Does dust accretion calculations

Parameters:
lastMass - The current mass of the planet
newstuff - Records the current accretion
a - The distance of the body from the sun (units of AU)
e - The orbital eccentricity
critMass - The critical mass value
dustBand - The current dust record for accretion
Returns:
The amount of accreted dust

getCriticalLimit

public double getCriticalLimit(double orbRadius,
                               double eccentricity,
                               double stellLuminosityRatio)
Calculates the critical limit for a planet.

Parameters:
orbRadius - The radius of the orbit in AU
eccentricity - The orbital eccecntricity
stellLuminosityRatio - The star luminosity (Sol = 1.0)
Returns:
The mass at which the planet begins to accrete gas as well as dust (in units of Solar mass).

accreteDust

public void accreteDust(com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.Accrete.NewRecord newstuff,
                        double a,
                        double e,
                        double critMass,
                        double bodyInnerBound,
                        double bodyOuterBound)
Accrete dust together to form large bodies

Parameters:
newstuff - A record detailing the current accreted mass
a - The distance from the sun of the body
e - The eccentricity of the body
critMass - The critical mass value
bodyInnerBound - The inner bound for the planet
bodyOuterBound - The outer bound for the planet

coalescePlanetesimals

public void coalescePlanetesimals(double a,
                                  double e,
                                  double mass,
                                  double critMass,
                                  double dustMass,
                                  double gasMass,
                                  double stellLuminosityRatio,
                                  double bodyInnerBound,
                                  double bodyOuterBound)
Coalesce plantesimals. Those with orbits that collide form a new planet. The remains can also form a planet.

Parameters:
a - The distance from the star that we are considering
e - The eccentricity of orbit that we are considering
mass - The current mass being considered
critMass - The critical mass value
dustMass - The amount of mass in the form of dust
gasMass - The amount of mass as gas
stellLuminosityRatio - The luminosity of the star (sol = 1.0)
bodyInnerBound - The inner bound for the planetary body
bodyOuterBound - The outer bound for the planetary body

distPlanetaryMasses

public Planet distPlanetaryMasses(double stellMassRatio,
                                  double stellLuminosityRatio,
                                  double innerDust,
                                  double outerDust,
                                  double outerPlanetLimit,
                                  double dustDensityCoeff,
                                  Planet seedSystem)
Handle the distribution of planetary masses.

Parameters:
stellMassRatio - The amount of mass available (sol = 1.0)
stellLuminosityRatio - The luminosity of the star (sol = 1.0)
innerDust - The inner dust limit
outerDust - The outer dust limit
outerPlanetLimit - The limit for the outermost planet
dustDensityCoeff - The coefficient of dust density
seedSystem - If non null then a list of planets to be used as seeds
Returns:
The first planet that has been produced in the system

A list of planetary records
